articles.title: Korean people's just cause supported abroad
articles.content:
Korean people's just cause supported abroad 
    Pyongyang,May 6 (KCNA) -- Participants in a seminar on the subject of "Struggle Of Socialist Countries Against Imperialist Globalization" which was held in Brussels to celebrate May Day under the sponsorship of the Belgian Labour Party expressed full support to the Korean people's just cause.
 The general secretary of the Belgian Labour Party, members of the party leadership and party members and the delegates of Communist Party of Cuba, the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist), the New Communist Party of Great Britain, the Communist Party of Bulgaria, the Workers Communist Party of Norway, the October 8 Revolutionary Movement of Brazil and other foreign political parties in their speeches extended full support to the workers' party and people of Korea firmly defending the socialist banner while resolutely countering the imperialist moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
